Clone Blocks:
assign current_match     = tx_access & 
			       tx_write &
		              (tx_datamode[1:0]==2'b11) &		       
			      (tx_ctrlmode[3:0]==4'b0000);

   assign next_match       =  etx_access &
			      etx_write &
		              (etx_datamode[1:0]==2'b11) &		       
			      (etx_ctrlmode[3:0]==4'b0000);
     
   assign tx_burst        =  ~tx_wait         &
		   	      current_match    &
			      next_match       &
			      burst_addr_match;
